Walter Emery thought you
might like to see this. Smith is the guy who
wrote you a couple of times regarding his
manuscript on Frieda Hennock.
Walter and Dick Hull and several others read
it and Walter wrote him to the effect that
he thought his article presented her too much
as the great shining light for ETV reservations
and that perhaps he should do some more reÂ¬
search and then write it again. This is Smith's
answer.
To Frank Schoolev
\vv
Regards,
